Know Us

Barret Requisites Trading DWC LLC

A Dubai World Central registered company. We are a production facilitating company that caters to any production, design, event and consultancy requirements for the client.

We have a pool of production partner, they join hands with us as per the client requirement and budget. We strive to go the extra mile satisfy and deliver the best to our clients.

For us every job is crucial, be it big or small, we dont differentiate. We treat every job with the same attention and zest, and try to bring out the best.

Expertise

Events

From ideas to implementation of a concept and from designing the stage to working on the technical rider...

Exhibition

We cater to everything from designing the stand to creating 3Ds and implementation of the renders to final products...

Digital

Any large or small format printing with application of the same...

Offset

All offset requirements from high-end brochures, boxes in leather, PU or paper, stationary collaterals...

Fabrication

From trophies, standees, islands, made out of different materials i.e. wood, metal, glass, crystal, acrylic...

Gifts & Premium

We can outsource any requirement of gifts & premiums from local or international market...
